INDX 0.01 documentation

INDX is a personal file store being developed at the University of Southampton, for the SOCIAM project.

get_or_create_file

box.get_or_create_file( fid )
<string> fid file id /// Tries to get a file with given id. If it doesn't exist, a file with that name is created. /// @return <File> the file

Arguments:
  1. fid

Returns:

get_box

store.get_box( boxid )

Arguments:

Returns:

create_box

store.create_box( boxid, )
Attempts to create a box with the given ID

Arguments:
  1. boxid <> <>

Returns:
Returns a promise. Asynchronous.
store.create_box(...).then ( <Box> the box, )
fail
  • store.create_box(...).fail ( <{ code: -1, error: error obj }> response, )
    other error
  • store.create_box(...).fail ( <{ code: 409 }> response, )
    box already exists
